title: 98/205/EC: Commission Decision of 3 March 1998 concerning the extension of an exemption granted to Germany pursuant to Article 8(2)(c) of Council Directive 70/156/EEC on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to the type-approval of motor vehicles and their trailers (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 3 March 1998 concerning the extension of an exemption granted to Germany pursuant to Article 8(2)(c) of Council Directive 70/156/EEC on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to the type-approval of motor vehicles and their trailers (Only the German text is authentic) (98/205/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The exemption granted to Germany by Decision 96/21/EC is hereby extended until the entry into force of the adaptations to the directives concerned and, in any case, for a period not exceeding twenty-four months.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 March 1998.
For the Commission
Martin BANGEMANN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 42, 23. 2. 1970, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 233, 25. 8. 1997, p. 1.
(3) OJ L 7, 10. 1. 1996, p. 8.
